body_html:
Thanks for the advise. Yes I did run ./configure, but I used bazel 0.1.1.

I tried again with both bazel 0.1.2 and bazel 0.1.3 and today's master. Howver I always get the following error:

ERROR: /system/user/bioinf01/tom/apps/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:148:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/core:gpu_runtime':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device_factory.cc':
  '/usr/local/cuda-7.5/include/cuda.h'
  '/usr/local/cuda-7.5/include/cufft.h'
  '/usr/local/cuda-7.5/include/cuComplex.h'

body:
Thanks for the advise. Yes I did run `./configure`, but I used bazel 0.1.1.

 I tried again with both bazel 0.1.2 and bazel 0.1.3 and today's master. Howver I always get the following error:

